bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Arthur Felberbaum (1935-1979) was a founder of The New York Marxist School, which grew out of the New York Committee for Marxist Education.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains materials relating to The New York Marxist School and to other activities of Arthur Felberbaum.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Tamiment Library received a donation of Arthur Felberbaum's papers; the date of this donation is unknown. The accession number associated with this gift is 1950.244.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Arthur Felberbaum are held by the heirs of Arthur Felberbaum. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which they hold copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Arthur Felberbaum's heirs.
